Methods

createDomain(parameters)

Create a domain name in DNS.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#dns_create_domain
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
domain string Domain name to create.
serverip string Server IP to use when creating default records (A and MX).
Source:
  • dns.js, line 7

createRecord(parameters)

Add a DNS record.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#dns_create_record
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
domain string Domain name to add record to.
name string Name (subdomain) of record.
type string Type (A, AAAA, MX, etc) of record.
data string Data for this record.
ttl number <optional>
 TTL of this record.
priority number <optional>
 (only required for MX and SRV) Priority of this record (omit the priority from the data).
Source:
  • dns.js, line 109

enableDNSSec(parameters)

Enable or disable DNSSEC for a domain.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#dns_dnssec_enable
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
domain string Domain name to update record.
enable string 'yes' or 'no'. If yes, DNSSEC will be enabled for the given domain.

updateRecord(parameters)

Update a DNS record.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#dns_update_record
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
domain string Domain name to update record.
RECORDID number ID of record to update.
name string <optional>
 Name (subdomain) of record.
data string <optional>
 Data for this record.
ttl number <optional>
 TTL of this record.
priority number <optional>
 (only required for MX and SRV) Priority of this record (omit the priority from the data).
Source:
  • dns.js, line 155

updateSOA(parameters)

Update the SOA record information for a domain.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#dns_soa_update
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
domain string Domain from which to gather DNSSEC keys.
nsprimary string <optional>
 Primary nameserver to store in the SOA record.
email string <optional>
 Administrative email to store in the SOA record.
